generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with visible lane markings and traffic.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs or barriers.

- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
